sentences.en: -- Behold me here, the one sinner of the world!
sentences.cn: —— 向这儿看, 看看我这个世上的罪人吧!

sentences.en: Dahlia . We fight for the sin, not the sinner.
sentences.cn: 我们与罪战斗,而非带罪之人.

sentences.en: Every saint has a past and every sinner a future.
sentences.cn: 每个圣己皆有过来,每个功人都无将来.

sentences.en: God welcomes the sinner who repents.
Hate the sin but not the sinner.
sentences.cn: 可恨的是罪行而非罪人.

sentences.en: He told me I was a terrible sinner, but I saw a twinkle in his eye.
sentences.cn: 他说我是个很可怕的罪人, 但是我注意到他的眼睛里闪闪发光呢.

sentences.en: Helping the helpless, cheering fainting, Seeking the wandering sinner to find.
sentences.cn: 帮助孤苦者, 鼓励灰心者,领人归基督, 寻找亡羊.

sentences.en: I am a sinner and I need to repent of my sins.
sentences.cn: 我是个罪人，必须忏悔我的罪过。

sentences.en: I know I owe many people many . Lord , have mercy on me, a sinner.
sentences.cn: 开玩笑. 我也知道那么一句:使人痛苦的两件事,得到了, 没得到.

sentences.en: In justification, the sinner is not only pardoned, he is promoted.
sentences.cn: 在称义里, 罪人不但得到宽恕而且得到高升.

sentences.en: Is it not trouble for the sinner, and destruction for the evil - doers?
sentences.cn: 岂不是祸患临到不义的, 灾害临到作孽的 呢 ?

sentences.en: Misfortune pursues the sinner, but prosperity is the reward of the righteous.
sentences.cn: 21祸患追赶罪人.义人必得善报.

sentences.en: Must it be thou, or I, that shall deal with this poor sinner's soul? "
sentences.cn: 到底该由你呢还是由我, 来探究这可怜的罪人的灵魂 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: That you are a sinner for all have sinned and come short of the glory of God.
sentences.cn: 而您只是个在上帝面前忏悔所有罪过的罪人，您永远也无法拥有上帝那样的荣誉。

sentences.en: The raft of knowledge ferries the worst sinner to safety.
sentences.cn: 知识之舟把罪恶深重的人载往安全的去处.

sentences.en: When this searching sermon was preached, each sinner fitted the cap on.
sentences.cn: 当这透人心肺的训诫结束时, 每个罪人都认为是讲自己.
